cargo-definestable: A description of a template, that is displayed on that template's page.
cargo-tablenotcreated: A notice to the user, displayed on a template page.
cargo-addsrows:
A description of a template, that is displayed on that template's page. Parameters:
* $1 - a database table name
* $2 - a template name
cargo-addsrows-missingdeclare:
A description of a template, displayed on that template's page. Parameters:
* $1 - a database table name
cargo-unknowntable:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a database table name
cargo-createtableaction:
This is a log entry.

Parameters:
* $2 - name of a table of data defined by the Cargo extension (parameter $1 is not used)
cargo-recreatetableaction:
This is a log entry.

Parameters:
* $2 - name of a table of data defined by the Cargo extension (parameter $1 is not used)
cargo-replacetableaction:
This is a log entry.

Parameters:
* $2 - name of a table of data defined by the Cargo extension (parameter $1 is not used)
cargo-deletetableaction:
This is a log entry.

Parameters:
* $2 - name of a table of data defined by the Cargo extension (parameter $1 is not used)
cargo-recreatedata-tablecreated: Informational message after success of creation of the table. ({{doc-cargo}})
cargo-recreatedata-replacementcreated: Informational message after success of creation of a table. ({{doc-cargo}})
cargo-recreatedata-success: Message displayed after user submits a "recreate data" form.
cargo-viewdata-tables:
Label in a form to set the names of one or more tables to query.
{{Identical|Table}}
cargo-viewdata-tablestooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Table(s) info icon.
cargo-viewdata-tablesrequired: This is the content of a validation error on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when a required field is missed.
cargo-viewdata-fields:
Label in a form to set the names of one or more fields to query.
{{Identical|Field}}
cargo-viewdata-fieldstooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Field(s) info icon.
cargo-viewdata-where:
Label in a form to set the equivalent of an SQL 'WHERE' clause.
{{Identical|Where}}
cargo-viewdata-wheretooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Where info icon.
cargo-viewdata-joinon: Label in a form to set the equivalent of an SQL 'JOIN ... ON' clause.
cargo-viewdata-joinontooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Join On info icon.
cargo-viewdata-joinonrequired: This is the content of a validation error on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when a required field is missed.
cargo-viewdata-groupby: Label in a form to set the equivalent of an SQL 'GROUP BY' clause.
cargo-viewdata-groupbytooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Group By info icon.
cargo-viewdata-having: Label in a form to set the equivalent of an SQL 'HAVING' clause.
cargo-viewdata-havingtooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Having info icon.
cargo-viewdata-orderby:
Label in a form to set the sort order for query results.
{{Identical|Order}}
cargo-viewdata-orderbytooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Order By info icon.
cargo-viewdata-limit:
Label in a form to set the limit on the number of results of a query.
{{Identical|Limit}}
cargo-viewdata-limittooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Limit info icon.
cargo-viewdata-offset: Label in a form to set the equivalent of an SQL 'OFFSET' clause.
cargo-viewdata-offsettooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Offset info icon.
cargo-viewdata-format:
Label in a form to set the display format for query results.
{{Identical|Format}}
cargo-viewdata-formattooltip: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:CargoQuery]] when you hover your mouse over a Format info icon.
cargo-viewdata-heightparam: Label in a form to set the height of the output
cargo-viewdata-widthparam: Label in a form to set the width of the output
cargo-viewdata-columnsparam: Label in a form to set the number of columns in the output
cargo-viewdata-colorsparam: Label in a form to set the colors in a chart
cargo-viewdata-hidelegendparam: Label in a form to hide the legend of a chart
cargo-viewdata-delimiterparam: Label in a form to set the delimiter (like ",") in the output
cargo-viewdata-modifyquery: Text of a link to a form
cargo-viewdata-viewwikitext: Text of a link to view a wikitext (MediaWiki syntax) parser function
cargo-query-badsqlfunction:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - form name (with link)
cargo-query-badalias:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - an SQL table alias
cargo-query-unknowndbtable:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a database table name
cargo-query-unknownfieldfortable:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a database field name
* $2 - a database table name
cargo-query-unknownfield:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a database field name
cargo-query-missingparam:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a #cargo_query parameter name
* $2 - a display format name
cargo-query-specifiedfieldmissing:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - a database field name
* $2 - a #cargo_query parameter name
cargo-cargotables-beingpopulated: An informational message to the user.
cargo-cargotables-viewtablelink: The text of a link to a subpage of [[Special:CargoTables]].
cargo-cargotables-viewreplacementlink: The text of a link to a subpage of [[Special:CargoTables]].
cargo-cargotables-replacementlink: Text in the Table column when table is a replacement
cargo-cargotables-tablestructure: A header for a list of fields
cargo-cargotables-totalrows:
Parameters:
* $1 - number of rows in a database table.
cargo-cargotables-switch: The text of a link to a subpage of [[Special:SwitchCargoTable]].
cargo-recreatedata-createreplacement: A label for a checkbox in [[Special:CargoRecreateData]].
cargo-recreatedata-replacementexists:
A warning message. Parameters:
* $1 - a database table name
* $2 - another database table name
cargo-cargotables-replacementtable:
Information shown in [[Special:CargoTables]]. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of a database table
cargo-cargotables-deletereplacement:
An alternate option for the user. Parameters:
* $1 - a link to a subpage of [[Special:DeleteCargoTable]]
cargo-deletetable-confirm:
Asks for confirmation to delete a database table. Parameters:
* $1 - the table name
cargo-deletetable-replacementconfirm:
Asks for confirmation to delete a "replacement" database table. Parameters:
* $1 - URL to view the replacement table
* $2 - name of the original table
cargo-deletetable-success:
Message displayed after user deletes a database table. Parameters:
* $1 - the table name.
cargo-switchtables-confirm:
Asks for confirmation to "switch in" in a replacement for a database table. Parameters:
* $1 - the name of the old table
cargo-switchtables-switch:
The text for a button that "switches in" a database table (deletes the old one, and renames the new one to have the name of the old one).
{{Identical|Switch}}
cargo-switchtables-success:
Message displayed after user replaces one database table with another. Parameters:
* $1 - the main table name.
cargo-drilldown-choosetable: This is the title of the box in [[Special:Drilldown]] that displays the tables that may be browsed.
cargo-drilldown-allpages:
The text of a link.
{{Identical|All pages}}
cargo-drilldown-filterbyvalue: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:Drilldown]] when you hover your mouse over a browsable value.
cargo-drilldown-removefilter: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:Drilldown]] when you hover your mouse over a filter currently in use.
cargo-drilldown-resetfilters: This is the content of a tooltip on [[Special:Drilldown]] when you hover your mouse over the name of a table.
cargo-drilldown-hierarchy-within:
The label for applied filter to indicate a search within the tree from the node specified
{{Identical|Within}}
cargo-drilldown-hierarchy-only: The label for filter values to indicate an exact search.
cargo-drilldown-addanothervalue: This is an informational message providing help for the usage of [[Special:Drilldown]].
cargo-drilldown-othervalues: The label for ComboBoxInput and TextBoxInput
cargo-drilldown-novalues: This is an informational message on [[Special:Drildown]].
cargo-drilldown-fulltext: The label for searching on all the text within a page or file.
cargo-drilldown-pagetext: The label for searching on all the text within a page.
cargo-drilldown-filename:
The label for displaying the name of a file uploaded to the wiki.
{{Identical|Filename}}
cargo-drilldown-filetext: The label for searching on all the text within a file.
cargo-dynamictables-togglecolumns: Label for toggle columns in dynamic tables
cargo-dynamictables-searchcolumn:
Placeholder for searchable columns. Parameters:
* $1 - field Name
cargo-purgecache: The name of a tab; the "cache" is the MediaWiki page cache.
cargo-purgecache-failed: Message displayed if the cache was unable to be purged for any reason.
cargo-pageschemas-cargofield: The label for the input field of the database column.
cargo-pageschemas-tablename: The label for the input field of the database table name.
